org.jgrapes.io

Interface DataConnection<T extends java.nio.Buffer>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Connection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    File, Server.SocketConnection

    public interface DataConnection<T extends java.nio.Buffer>
extends Connection
    Represents an I/O connection that is used to transfer data.
    Author:
    Michael N. Lipp

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T acquireWriteBuffer()
      Get a buffer suitable to be passed to Write events.
      void releaseReadBuffer(T buffer)
      Releases a buffer used by a Read event.
      void releaseWriteBuffer(T buffer)
      Releases a buffer used by a Write event.

        getChannel

    • Method Detail

      • releaseReadBuffer

        void releaseReadBuffer(T buffer)
        Releases a buffer used by a Read event. This method is invoked automatically upon the completion of a Read event.
        Parameters:
        buffer -

      • acquireWriteBuffer

        T acquireWriteBuffer()
              throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Get a buffer suitable to be passed to Write events.
        Returns:
        the buffer
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the invoking thread is interrupted while waiting for a buffer

      • releaseWriteBuffer

        void releaseWriteBuffer(T buffer)
        Releases a buffer used by a Write event. This method is invoked automatically upon the completion of a Write event.
